infos.value: It seems that the second division, «Nitor», has been dispatched.
What could that slug Robb be up to...?
You're allied with Hourne, aren't you? It seems natural that they'd send reinforcements.
Even if Wezette tries to raise an army, with Hourne's forces there, they'll be pushed right back into the ground.
Know yer place. This has nothing to do with yer.
Clearly, obtaining the ancient relic is the real goal. Go ahead, tell me I'm wrong.
If so, I dare say the Hourne scum are about to get in our way.
